about.title: About Le Dream Hotel
about.founders: Le Dream Hotel is a family-owned stay in Vigan, founded by <0>Lorry and Engracia Salvador</0> to offer comfort and culture in one destination.
about.rooftop: Enjoy local and international flavors at our rooftop <0>LAK’s Bar & Resto</0>, with scenic views of the city and sea.
about.location: We’re located in <0>Tamag, Vigan City</0> —minutes from Calle Crisologo, Baluarte Zoo, and UNP.
about.events: We also host events and conferences with a spacious hall and ample parking.
about.closing: At Le Dream Hotel, we’re more than a place to stay — <0>we’re your dream getaway.</0>

cards.heading: Top Amenities & Services at Le Dream Hotel
cards.description: From stylish accommodations to rooftop dining and seamless guest services, Le Dream Hotel offers everything you need for a comfortable, memorable stay in Vigan.

items.title: Comfortable Accommodations
items.description: Family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, work desks, TVs, and free WiFi for a cozy and convenient stay.

items.title: Dining & Leisure
items.description: Enjoy local and international cuisine at our restaurant, unwind at the rooftop bar, or grab a drink from the coffee shop—all with free WiFi access.

items.title: Convenient Services
items.description: 24/7 front desk, concierge, tour assistance, and free parking ensure a smooth and stress-free guest experience from check-in to check-out.

items.title: Nearby Attractions
items.description: Located near Calle Crisologo, Bantay Bell Tower, and more—perfectly positioned to explore Vigan’s rich culture and history.

video.heading: Explore Our Hotel
video.description: Take a quick video tour and discover our relaxing rooms, luxurious amenities, and stunning views.

rooms.heading: Accomodation
rooms.description: Experience the blend of luxury and comfort at Le Dream Hotel. We offer several distinct room types to cater to your unique needs. Each room is equipped with a host of amenities designed for your comfort and convenience.

amenities.heading: Accomodation
amenities.description: We're committed to providing you with top-notch services to enhance your stay. Our amenities include Kalle Cafe' Specialty Coffee, iWash Laundry & Dry-Cleaning, Airport Pick-up & Drop-off, and our Service Van, to name a few.few.

resto-bar.heading: Accomodation
resto-bar.description: Indulge in a unique dining experience at our rooftop restaurant, LAK's Bar + Resto. Dine in style, with a stunning view that complements the exquisite flavors of our menu.

explore.heading: Accomodation
explore.description: Discover the wonders of Vigan, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Explore the historic streets of Calle Crisologo, visit the Baluarte Zoo, and immerse yourself in the rich culture and heritage of this beautiful city.
